items.summary: Create a new table component that displays raw-marks percentage for every grade (9, 10, 11, 12) across both Term 1 and Term 2, with columns for Grade, Term 1 %, and Term 2 %

Create a frequency-polygon chart that visualizes the combined percentage distribution using Term 1 and Term 2 data, plotting percentage ranges on the x-axis and frequency counts on the y-axis with connected line segments
Integrate the new raw-marks percentage table and frequency-polygon chart into the existing AcademicModule component, adding them as new tabs or sections in the Progress View
